articles.title: Legend Internet Receives Approval to List 2bn Shares on NGX
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Legend Internet Plc is launching LegendMail, Nigeria's first email ecosystem with built-in payments, secure storage, and a unified user ID. The company is bundling these digital services with its fiber infrastructure to create an integrated digital experience. This is part of Legend's broader strategy to build a tech ecosystem of services and expand its nationwide reach after listing on the NGX.

articles.title: GT Voice: Innovation solidifies China's key role in world's NEV supply chain
articles.author: Global Times
articles.summary: CATL has introduced three new products including the second-generation Shenxing battery, which can add 520 kilometers of driving range from five minutes of charging.  XPENG and Volkswagen announced a collaboration on superfast charging network, and BMW and Alibaba are partnering to integrate AI into BMW's next-generation vehicles. These launches and collaborations demonstrate the pivotal role of Chinese innovation in the global automotive industry.

articles.title: I Tested Sun Home's New Infrared Sauna & Here's Why It's the Ultimate At-Home Wellness Essential
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: The brand tested Luminar XL, its latest seven-person model.

articles.title: Best-selling NEXPURE Ionic Blow Dryer: $90 off at Walmart for a limited time
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a flash deal on the NEXPURE 1800W Professional Ionic Blow Dryer, reducing the price from $120 to $30. The dryer features ion and bio-ceramic technology, releasing moisturizing negative ions and far-infrared heat to reduce static and prevent overheating damage.

articles.title: Digital Brands Partners with Amaze to Expand Teespring Marketplace. Teespring Will Leverage Amaze's 12.3 Million Unique Stores to Significantly Expand Reach of AVO by DSTLD.  Apr. 22, 2025 22:35
articles.summary: Digital Brands Group has partnered with Amaze to launch its fashion label, AVO by DSTLD, on the revamped Teespring Marketplace. This partnership enables Amaze customers to directly shop AVO by DSTLD within the Teespring Marketplace. It expands Teespring Marketplace's product collection, boosts Digital Brands Group's brand visibility, and introduces new products to a large audience.

articles.title: Meet the Lada Niva Camper: compact Russian motorhome offers 4×4 drive and affordable price
articles.author: tbcosta
articles.summary: Lada introduced the Niva Camper, a compact 4x4 motorhome priced around $20,400 USD. Lux Form converted the original chassis to include a full kitchen, bathroom with shower, living area, and water tanks. The Niva Camper maintains off-road capability with full-time 4x4 traction and good ground clearance, despite its modest 1.7L 80hp engine.

articles.title: Want Healthier-Looking Hair? This Unexpected Beauty Product Might Be the Answer
articles.author: Marie Claire Editors
articles.summary: Culligan introduced the Aquasential® Smart High Efficiency Water Softener to remove mineral content from water. The softener is manageable through an app that tracks water usage and maintenance needs. It promotes healthier skin and hair, and better performance for water-using appliances.

articles.title: The viral Bissell Little Green just got a mini makeover! Here's how it stacks up
articles.summary: Bissell has launched the Little Green Mini, a smaller and more portable version of its popular Little Green carpet cleaner. The Mini costs $95 and features a 16-ounce clean-water tank, a 4-foot hose, and a 12-foot power cord. It effectively removes stains and is suitable for small spaces and occasional messes.

articles.title: Digital Brands Partners with Amaze to Expand Teespring Marketplace. Teespring Will Leverage Amaze's 1.2 Million Creators to Significantly Expand Reach of AVO by DSTLD.  Apr. 22, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Digital Brands Group has partnered with Amaze to offer AVO by DSTLD fashion products on the Teespring Marketplace. This collaboration expands the Teespring Marketplace's product collection and gives Digital Brands Group access to a larger audience, with the goal of accelerating the growth of their fashion brands. The AVO by DSTLD products will soon be available at teespring.com.

articles.title: Del Taco Launches Brand Refresh and NEW El Big Boxes to Deliver Bigger Flavor, Bigger Value
articles.author: Del Taco
articles.summary: Del Taco introduced El Big Boxes this spring, emphasizing real ingredients, generous portions, and value. The company is highlighting its heritage with a fresh new look alongside the new product launch.

articles.title: Neiman Marcus has the new Maison Francis Kurkdjian perfume with a lightweight summer scent — and a free gift
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Maison Francis Kurkdjian has launched a new summer-scented perfume named "Kurky Eau de Parfum", which features fruit, musk and vanilla notes. It is available at Neiman Marcus for $245, and customers receive a free gift with purchase. The scent is named after the founder Francis Kurkdjian and is described as woody and musky.

articles.title: Sunless, Inc. Repositions as INNOVÉ Beauty & Wellness
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sunless has rebranded as INNOVÉ Beauty & Wellness, strategically repositioning itself with an expanded focus in the beauty and wellness sector. This new brand encompasses a portfolio of recognized names, including Mystic, Norvell®, VersaSpa®, and WELLFIT™ Skincare Solutions, to offer comprehensive skincare solutions.

articles.title: Fiesta Medal Giveaway: Natalie Reyes State Farm
articles.summary: KENS 5 streaming service is accessible on mobile devices through the KENS 5 app. To stream KENS 5 on a phone, users are required to download and use the KENS 5 app.

articles.title: LG pioneers subscription-based home appliances in Thailand, transforming modern living
articles.summary: LG has launched its 'LG Subscribe' service in Thailand, offering a subscription model for a range of 14 product categories including water purifiers and premium televisions. The service includes regular maintenance, full warranty coverage, and flexible monthly payment plans, targeting urban professionals and young families. LG plans to expand its store network to 150 locations nationwide with a goal of reaching 40,000 subscribers.

articles.title: These 8 drugstore shampoos we tested are sneaky good and budget-friendly
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: The New York Post highlights new drugstore shampoos, recommending L'Oreal Paris EverPure, Odele Clarifying Shampoo, Raw Sugar The Grow Pro, CeraVe Gentle Hydrating Shampoo, Kristin Ess The One Signature Shampoo, California Naturals Classic Shampoo, OGX Thick & Full Biotin & Collagen Shampoo, and Pantene Pro-V Radiant Color Shine Shampoo. The article presents product features such as sulfate-free formulations, moisturizing ingredients like hyaluronic acid, and benefits for various hair types, providing practical insights into each shampoo's performance.

articles.title: Age Smarter, Not Harder: 51 Ingenious Products That Make Life Easier
articles.author: Cheyenne Miller
articles.summary: Various products are introduced aimed at enhancing the lives of older adults. This includes items such as a jar opener, bath mat, car assist device, and bottle openers, all designed for ease of use. Other products include a bendable neck light, foot massager, solar path lights, walking cane, senior tablets, pill organizer, bed rail, water flosser, food chopper, seat cushion, doormat, robot vacuum, key finder, telescoping pole, bandage wraps, acupressure tool, grass fed beef liver capsules, memory foam house shoes, hand massager, slip-on shoes, electric spin scrubber, safety pole, LED magnifier, rocker, footrest, sheet gripper clips, can opener, white noise machine, probiotics, grabber tool, TV remote, shiatsu pillow, walker, percussion massager, shoe horn, Echo Pop speaker, herbal supplement, arch support braces, non-electric bidet, assistance handle, pull tab opener, alarm clock, grab bars, dustpan vacuum, call button system, and washable bath mat.

articles.title: V-Guard Industries targets double-digit growth in BLDC fans
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: A company has launched a new product line called the AirWiz series of ceiling fans. This introduction expands the company's product offerings in the home appliance market.

articles.title: 1Password unveils new security and Agentic AI capabilities for XAM platform
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: 1Password introduced new features for 1Password XAM. This signals an update to the 1Password service.

articles.title: Reviewers Say This Hands-Free Mop Is The Last One ‘You'll Ever Have To Purchase' And It's 20% Off
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: A 'hands-free' mop and bucket combo is available for purchase on Amazon, currently at a 20% discount. This cleaning system features separate wet and dry sections in the bucket with a built-in squeegee, machine-washable microfiber pads and a telescopic mop handle. Users praise its absorbency, ease of use, and effectiveness on various floor types.

articles.title: I've spent a few hours with the Insta360 X5 – and it feels like the most refined 360 degree camera to date
articles.author: Sam Kieldsen
articles.summary: Insta360 has launched the Insta360 X5, the successor to the X4, on April 22, 2025. The X5 features 1/1.28-inch image sensors and AI chips to improve image quality, and is priced starting at $549.99. It is also available in an Essentials bundle for $659.99.

articles.title: Нов регламент за търговия притесни хората в Турция, че сайтове като Temu може да бъдат блокирани
articles.author: Снимка: AP/БТА
articles.summary: The Turkish Ministry of Trade has initiated product inspections impacting imported goods. New regulations require e-commerce companies like Temu to offer product representation in Turkish, display prices in Turkish Lira, and provide delivery to Turkish addresses when operating in Turkey.

articles.title: Coupang to sell Kiehl's skincare products on R.LUX with launch promotion
articles.author: PAIK JI-HWAN
articles.summary: Coupang's R.LUX platform is introducing Kiehl's skincare products with a special promotion through Sunday. The promotion will showcase Kiehl's products, including Ultra Facial Cream and Calendula Herbal-Extract Toner and involves a complimentary daily care kit and 10 percent cash rewards for Coupang WOW members.

articles.title: Why Invest Billions into Social Media Platforms When You Can Create Smarter Solutions?
articles.author: jhilton
articles.summary: DogeNote.ai has launched a new social media app that offers a clean, no-nonsense alternative to existing platforms. The app focuses on essential functions and a streamlined user experience, challenging the trend of over-engineered social media platforms. It provides users with an easy way to share their thoughts and find new connections and visibility.

articles.title: Canva Launches AI Paragraph Generator to Help Users Write Faster and Easier
articles.author: Canva
articles.summary: Canva has introduced the AI Paragraph Generator, a new tool for quickly crafting text from a prompt, and launched Canva Visual Suite 2.0. This AI-powered feature suite expands on Canva's existing tools to streamline content creation for various applications like social media, marketing, and business.

articles.title: The Two OpenAIs
articles.author: Matteo Wong
articles.summary: OpenAI is introducing new user experience updates to ChatGPT, such as an 'image library' feature and the ability to 'reference' past chats to provide personalized responses. The company is also considering expanding into hardware and potentially launching a social network to retain users and compete with other tech companies like Google and Apple.

articles.title: The Great AI Lock-In Has Begun
articles.author: Matteo Wong
articles.summary: OpenAI is updating ChatGPT with features like an 'image library' and personalized responses using past chats. The company is considering expanding into social networks and hardware to build an ecosystem, similar to Meta, Apple, and Google. To foster long-term loyalty, OpenAI is offering free access to a premium tier of ChatGPT for college students.

articles.title: Ex-Meta engineer raises $14M for Lace AI, a revenue generation software startup
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Lace AI has launched AI-driven customer service software designed for home service companies. The software, called revenue intelligence software, utilizes AI to analyze all incoming calls to these businesses, aiming to identify and capitalize on missed revenue opportunities. This offering monitors 100% of the calls.

articles.title: SKYWORTH Unveils Revolutionary OmniView Matte Screen, Pushing MiniLED Displays to OLED-Level Performance  Apr. 22, 2025 15:57
articles.summary: SKYWORTH showcased its new OmniView Matte Screen at the Canton Fair, featuring multiple high-performance layers for superior contrast, wide viewing angles, exceptional brightness, and enhanced eye comfort. The company also presented the 100-inch Frame+ TV, gaming TV series, and AI Karaoke Google TV series, reflecting its commitment to user-centered innovation.

articles.title: Aldi to launch £3.99 dupe of £26 Huda Beauty product
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new Lacura beauty products on May 1, including a £3.99 concealer and £4.99 'Faultless Finish' setting powders. The range also includes the Lacura Glamour Wand highlighter (£3.99) and Lacura moisturising peptide lip treatments (£2.99). These products are presented as affordable alternatives to brands like Huda Beauty.

articles.title: Fujifilm Teases New Camera Promising ‘Half the Size, Twice the Story'
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Fujifilm released a teaser video for a new camera. The new camera is advertised as being half the size with twice the storytelling capability.

articles.title: Amaze Expands Teespring Marketplace with Premium Lifestyle Fashion from Digital Brands Group, Inc.
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: Amaze partnered with Teespring Marketplace to diversify fashion offerings for shoppers. This partnership expands Digital Brand Groups' reach, suggesting an introduction of new products or services within the fashion category.

articles.title: Best SSDs: From SATA to PCIe 5.0, from budget to premium
articles.author: Jon Jacobi
articles.summary: EaseUS Disk Copy software is promoted as a solution for upgrading to SSDs. It facilitates HDD/SSD cloning, data migration from HDDs to SSDs, and SSD cloning under Windows, with features like 4K sector alignment and SSD layout autofitting.  A promotion code PCWORLD25 offers a 25% discount.

articles.title: Microsoft explains why TPM makes Windows 11 PCs better for you
articles.author: Kristian Kask
articles.summary: Microsoft is urging Windows 10 users to upgrade to Windows 11 as Windows 10 support ends. The company is promoting the benefits of Windows 11 to encourage this transition, even suggesting users purchase new PCs capable of running the newer operating system.

articles.title: ''Mad' dessert and ice cream café with doughnut sandwiches to open in former city centre lasagne spot
articles.author: Adam Maidment
articles.summary: Baby Mayhem, a new ice cream and dessert café, is opening in Ancoats. Led by James Turner, the café will offer unique doughnut sandwiches, soft-serve ice cream, and other desserts. The soft launch is scheduled for this weekend at 23 Radium Street.

articles.title: New Balance's ‘Great' Fresh Foam Shoes Are on Sale Now for Only $35
articles.author: Kelsey McCarson
articles.summary: Joe's New Balance Outlet is offering New Balance Fresh Foam 510v6 men's shoes for $35, discounted from a list price of $75. The promotion includes a 30% discount applied at checkout, with availability in two color options and varying sizes. Buyers have given the shoes positive reviews, praising their fit, comfort, and support.

articles.title: 100 Years of Purdy® Pride—Now With 3 New Tools for Professional Painters
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Purdy, a brand known for painting tools, is launching three new products: the Purdy Altitude™ Roller Cover, the Purdy POLE+ Extension Pole, and the Purdy Pro-Extra® High-Capacity Brush. This launch commemorates Purdy's 100th anniversary.

articles.title: Cadent Pact Brings ‘Expanded Performance Ad Solutions' To TV
articles.author: RBR-TVBR
articles.summary: Cadent launched a new 'unified, enterprise-class' advertising system. The system uses predictive modeling and real-time performance optimizations. It is designed to transform the omnichannel workflow.

articles.title: Credibly Announces the Launch of Credibly.ai - an Innovation and Technology Showcase for Automation and Generative AI Use Cases in Fintech
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Credibly launched Credibly.ai, a GenAI-powered lending platform aimed at supporting small businesses. The new platform is designed as an innovation and technology showcase.

articles.title: Tim Hortons UK: Unique twist on iconic food items
articles.author: Food
articles.summary: Tim Hortons UK has launched two new menu items: the Old Fashioned Glazed Donut Chicken Sandwich (with a meatless option) and Cheesy Loaded Timbits. These items blend sweet and savory flavors and are available for a limited time at Tim Hortons restaurants across the UK. The launch is part of a celebration encouraging kindness to staff.

articles.title: 13 trendy Nordstrom gifts that will make any mom feel spoiled this Mother's Day
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Nordstrom features several products suitable for Mother's Day gifts, including the UGG Tazz Platform Slipper, Eberjey Gisele Relaxed Jersey Knit Short Pajamas, and the Solawave 4-in-1 Skin Care Wand. Additionally, there's the Favorite Daughter Mom of the Year Baseball Cap, Mac Duggal Gold Plated Hardware Grain Leather Saddle Bag, and nodpod Sleep Mask. Also featured are the Little Words Project Boy Mom Stretch Bracelet, Barefoot Dreams CozyChic® Animal Print Throw Blanket, Stanley The Quencher H2.0 Flowstate™ 30-Ounce Tumbler, and the Bitty Boggs Tote Bag, catering to diverse preferences and needs.

articles.title: No customer left behind: Why customer-centric business practices should be a priority for every CEO
articles.author: Darren Heffernan
articles.summary: Trintech is leveraging AI to enhance its product offerings and revolutionize how it serves customers in the financial close cycle. Their AI-powered finance agents automate reconciliations, reduce errors, and provide real-time insights. The company is also using AI to personalize support and anticipate customer needs.

articles.title: ⚡Adani's ADNL, Airtel's Bharti Hexacom Limited Join Hands for 400 MHz Spectrum Transfer
articles.summary: Samsung delayed the launch of the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE and Samsung Galaxy Tri-Fold. The article indicates an estimated arrival time and mentions expected price, specifications, and features.

articles.title: Inventive AI Launches AI RFP Agent to Revolutionize RFP Teams, Enabling 90% Faster Responses and ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Inventive AI launched its AI RFP Agent, a next-generation AI agent, to assist sales, proposal, and solutions teams in responding to Requests for Proposals (RFPs). The AI RFP Agent aims to help sales teams win deals.

articles.title: Astound Unveils Bold New Pricing Structure That Puts Customers in Control
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Astound launched a new pricing structure for its Internet, Mobile, and TV services. This new structure aims to eliminate confusion and offer greater value and control to customers through simplified and flexible pricing.

articles.title: Womaness Expands Retail Footprint, Bringing Perimenopause and Menopause Care to Walmart
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Womaness, a menopause solutions brand, launched its product line in select Walmart stores. This launch makes innovative menopause products more accessible and affordable.

articles.title: Teads and Mercedes-Benz Drive Brand Lift with Thailand's First Connected TV Campaign  Apr. 22, 2025 13:00
articles.summary: Teads partnered with Mercedes-Benz to launch its first Connected TV (CTV) campaign in Thailand as part of the Defining Class 2.0 initiative. The campaign utilized an omnichannel approach, including CTV Native Placement and Video Placements, and achieved significant uplifts in brand metrics such as awareness, preference, and purchase intent, reinforcing Mercedes-Benz's position as a top luxury automotive brand in Thailand.

articles.title: ASAPP Achieves the AWS Generative AI Competency
articles.author: ASAPP
articles.summary: ASAPP has achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Generative AI Competency. The company's AI-native product suite includes GenerativeAgent, an enterprise generative AI agent designed to accelerate the resolution of complex customer service interactions. GenerativeAgent is built for enterprise needs and aims to improve customer satisfaction and deliver measurable ROI.

articles.title: 🧼Best tested cleaning products, per consumer experts
articles.author: Anna Kocharian
articles.summary: Zep introduced Pro-Tabs All-Purpose Cleaner, a tablet form cleaner for surfaces like countertops and tile, while Mrs. Meyers Clean Day Multi-Surface Concentrate is effective on floors and mirrors. Mr. Clean Multipurpose Cleaner features a 'power nozzle' for controlled spray and is effective on greasy surfaces. Sprayway's foaming glass cleaner, Goo Gone Grout & Tile Cleaner, Bon Ami cleanser, Folex Instant Carpet Spot Remover, Dawn Ultra Dishwashing Liquid, Skura Style Skrubby Sponge, Moxie Extra Strength Eraser Pads, Method All-Purpose Cleaning Wipes, Bounty paper towels, and Utopia washcloths are also available for specific cleaning needs.

articles.title: How AI is Transforming Digital Marketing in 2025
articles.author: Becky
articles.summary: Impression Media uses AI to provide personalized digital marketing services such as tailored website experiences, product recommendations and email sequences. They also help businesses optimize for voice search, integrate AI-powered voice interfaces, and provide smart bots to create seamless user experiences. The company utilizes AI-driven dashboards to enable real-time campaign adjustments and A/B testing for optimal performance.

articles.title: Aldi launching exciting new makeup dupes of fan-favourite brand – exact date they hit shelves
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new beauty dupes under its Lacura brand on May 1st, including a full coverage concealer priced at £3.99, setting powders for £4.99, a Glamour Wand Highlighter for £3.99, and Moisturising Peptide Lip Treatments for £2.99. These products are positioned as affordable alternatives to higher-end brands like Huda Beauty and Rhode Skin.

articles.title: Aldi launching exciting new makeup dupes of fan-favourite brand – exact date they hit shelves
articles.author: Digital Fabulous Editor
articles.summary: Aldi is launching new Lacura beauty products on May 1st, including dupes for Huda Beauty's setting powder and concealer, as well as a Glamour Wand Highlighter and Moisturising Peptide Lip Treatments. The Lacura products are significantly cheaper, with the concealer priced at £3.99 and the setting powder at £4.99, offering savings compared to the original brands.

articles.title: 4 Must Have Gel Moisturizers to Hydrate this Summer
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Dot & Key launched the 72Hr Hydrating Probiotics Gel Moisturizer, featuring 72-hour hydration, oil-free formula, hyaluronic acid, and probiotics. Plum introduced the Rice Water & Niacinamide Gel Cream that hydrates and brightens the skin, while Ponds offers Oil-Free Super Light Gel with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E for deep hydration. Lakme launched Absolute Hydra Pro Gel Creme providing 72-hour intense hydration.

articles.title: Must-Buy Brightening Face Washes for a Radiant Summer Glow
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Plum introduces Simply Bright 2% Niacinamide Face Wash, designed to brighten and smooth skin. Lakme launches Perfect Radiance Brightening Facewash, formulated with 98% Pure Niacinamide for radiant skin. Dr. Sheth's presents Gulab & 1% Glycolic Acid Face Wash to exfoliate and renew skin. Dot and Key offers Watermelon Cooling Gel Facewash, featuring Vitamin C and cucumber for oil control and a cooling effect.

articles.title: TencentDB TDSQL: Revolutionizing Data Management Beyond HBase
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: TencentDB TDSQL launched TDStore Engine, a NewSQL alternative to HBase for historical data storage. TDStore offers cost efficiency with LZ4+ZSTD compression, reducing storage demands by 47% compared to HBase's Snappy and query latency reduction from 150 ms to 37 ms.

articles.title: Car Wash Ancillary Products Market Size & Growth
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Washminute, a Moroccan car wash startup, secured $600,000 in funding to accelerate its expansion plans. ZIPS Car Wash announced strategic measures to strengthen its financial foundation and advance its operational change, supported by an additional $70 million investment from Atlantic Street Capital for growth and modernization.

articles.title: Lush slashes popular bath bomb by more than 30 per cent to celebrate birthday
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Lush is celebrating its 30th birthday and World Bath Bomb Day by introducing 30 new bath bombs.  Customers can purchase these new bath bombs on the Lush app starting April 22nd and in-store/online beginning April 24th. Additionally, the company is offering a reduced price on their 'Butterball' bath bomb when purchased with one of the new exclusive bath bombs.

articles.title: Mercedes V-Class of the future: Vision V concept is a lounge on wheels with immersive cinema screen
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Mercedes is introducing its VAN.EA electric architecture, showcased by the Vision V concept car, which previews a new range of electric vans. The Vision V concept includes high-end features like a 65-inch cinema screen, Dolby Atmos sound, and luxurious interior finishes, targeting the VIP shuttle market, though the range will also include family vehicles.

articles.title: The Cannabist Company Celebrates Launch of Adult-Use Sales at Cannabist Mays Landing in New Jersey
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: The Cannabist Company has commenced adult-use sales at its new Cannabist Mays Landing dispensary in New Jersey. A grand opening celebration occurred on April 29 and featured vendors, giveaways, and Ric Flair. The dispensary offers house brands like Classix, Hedy, Seed & Strain, Triples Seven and recently launched dreamt and partners with brands like Bloom and Ric Flair Drip.

articles.title: Best 5 Body Lotions With SPF on Myntra: Prevent Your Skin From Unwanted Tanning
articles.summary: Nivea, Mcaffeine, and Vaseline offer body lotions with SPF protection. These lotions aim to protect the skin from tanning and harmful sun rays. The products are available for purchase.

articles.title: Bratz Continues Its Social Media Virality with the Release of Alwayz Bratz Season Two and New ...
articles.author: Mga Entertainment
articles.summary: Bratz, in partnership with CapCut, has launched a new AI-branded effect called 'bratzification' which is designed to transform users into Bratz characters on social media platforms. The effect is specifically designed to imitate the Alwayz Bratz season two animation style. This AI effect can be used across social platforms including TikTok and Instagram.

articles.title: Bratz Continues Its Social Media Virality with the Release of Alwayz Bratz Season Two and New ...
articles.author: MGA Entertainment
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment's Bratz brand has released the second season of its animated series, Alwayz Bratz, on Instagram and TikTok. In addition, Bratz has launched an AI-branded effect in partnership with CapCut, enabling users to transform themselves into Bratz characters in the style of the second season's animation.

articles.title: The Ninja gadget that 'takes all the hard work out' of cooking now 33% off
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: Ninja has reduced the price of the Ninja Foodi blender & soup maker by 33%, now available for £120. This appliance blends and cooks, creating soups, sauces, smoothies, and more. Competing products include the Tefal perfectmix cook and Morphy Richards total control soup maker.

articles.title: SimpliiGood's Spirulina-based Smoked Salmon Goes Commercial
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: SimpliiGood by AlgaeCore Technologies, Ltd. is commercially launching its 100% plant-based smoked salmon analog made from spirulina microalgae.  The company has transitioned to commercial output of its texturized fresh spirulina branded Simplii Texture and has secured EU regulatory clearance and is undergoing pilot programs in Europe and Israel.

articles.title: LG Electronics rolls out tumbler washer MyCup
articles.author: 글쓰는 편집장
articles.summary: LG Electronics will launch MyCup, a tumbler washer for B2B initiatives. LG Electronics plans to install MyCup in all 2,000 Starbucks stores by the end of the year through a partnership with SCK Company Co. The company also plans collaborations with public organizations to expand the product's adoption.

articles.title: 'I found perfect polka dot Marks and Spencer dress that's ideal for summer weddings'
articles.author: Ben Lyons
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has introduced the Lyocell Rich Polka Dot Sweetheart Neckline Maxi Waisted Dress as part of its spring collection. Priced at £79, the dress features a polka dot design, a Bardot neckline, ruching on the bodice, and is available in petite, regular, and tall lengths in sizes six to 24.

articles.title: 'I found perfect polka dot Marks and Spencer dress ideal for weddings'
articles.author: Ben Lyons
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has unveiled the second part of its spring collection, featuring the Lyocell Rich Polka Dot Sweetheart Neckline Maxi Waisted Dress, priced at £79. The dress, available in petite, regular, and tall lengths in sizes six to 24, features a Bardot neckline, ruching on the bodice, and a midi length.

articles.title: China's CATL Says It Has Overtaken BYD On 5-Minute EV Charging Time
articles.summary: CATL unveiled its second-generation Shenxing battery. The battery delivers a 520km range with only five minutes of charging.

articles.title: Renault Twingo bude mít sourozence i s logem Nissanu
articles.author: Autor: Radek Pecák
articles.summary: Renault is introducing the Twingo E-Tech Concept 2025.

articles.title: The Role of E-Commerce in the Eyewear Industry: How Brands Are Breaking Traditional Barriers
articles.author: Created by
articles.summary: SmartBuyGlasses utilizes e-commerce and AR/AI to offer customers a convenient, personalized shopping experience with features such as a virtual try-on tool.  They offer a direct-to-consumer business model, easy online prescription uploads, a wide range of product choices, and customer engagement via discounts and loyalty programs.

articles.title: Spinny, Sachin Tendulkar and a promise for ages: God Promise
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Spinny, an Indian used car platform, launched a new campaign called "God Promise" featuring Sachin Tendulkar, to build trust and assure customers about the quality of their car buying and selling experience. The campaign is being rolled out across various media platforms, including TV, digital, radio, and social media, during the IPL season.

articles.title: Is Samsung working on a rollable phone with a vertically extendable screen?
articles.summary: Samsung is exploring a vertically rollable smartphone, expanding into a taller screen, while Motorola showcased a rollable phone concept with a 5-inch OLED screen extending to 6.5 inches. Samsung's version is still in early development, while Motorola's concept, though innovative, faces challenges regarding weight and screen fragility.

articles.title: Revolutionary Launch: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus Debuts in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 60 Stylus smartphone in India on April 23rd. The device features a built-in stylus, AI-driven tools, and a top-tier camera system, and is available on Flipkart, Motorola's website, and retail stores for Rs. 21,999.

articles.title: OPPO F29 Series: A durable champion designed for India's everyday heroes
articles.author: Prakshali Tiwari
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the F29 Series, a smartphone designed for India's on-the-go professionals. The F29 Series is built for durability, featuring water resistance, drop resistance, and long-lasting battery performance, and tested in India by SGS. It includes features like Hunter Antenna Architecture for stronger connectivity and comes in both standard and Pro versions with high-capacity batteries and fast charging.

articles.title: Vivo T4 5G launched with a massive 7300mAh battery, priced starting at Rs 21,999
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Vivo launched the Vivo T G smartphone. The Vivo T G is priced starting at Rs and features a large mAh battery.

articles.title: Olam Agri introduces Crown Thick Spaghetti: A delicious new twist on a classic favorite
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: Olam Agri introduced Crown Thick Spaghetti, a new product designed to meet the desires of Nigerian consumers for thick strand spaghetti. Distributors enthusiastically received the new Crown Thick Spaghetti.

articles.title: Garden lovers race to B&Q as patio moss and algae ‘killer' halved in price just in time for summer
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: B&Q is offering a significant discount on the Bosch pressure washer, reducing the price from £159 to £80. The Bosch pressure washer is designed for fast, flexible, and effortless cleaning, featuring a Trio Nozzle and a High-Pressure Detergent Nozzle.

articles.title: Waterproof Socks Market Expected to Reach $116.98 Billion by 2032, with a CAGR of 4.77% from 2025-2032
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: The global waterproof socks market includes companies such as Footland Inc., Sealskinz, DexShell, Paultex Hosiery Ltd., and HANZ USA. The report covers the market analysis of waterproof socks provided by these companies.

articles.title: The Dyson V11 Origin is $100 off right now, and it almost makes vacuuming look fun
articles.author: Christian Wait
articles.summary: Dyson V11 Origin cordless vacuum is available for $469.99 at Amazon as of April 22, which is a $100 discount from its regular price. The Dyson V11 Origin has up to 60 minutes of run time and 60% more power than previous Dyson models, with three power modes and an LCD screen displaying remaining run time.

articles.title: Party Rings unveils first new biscuit shape in 42 years
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Party Rings, owned by Fox's Burton's Companies (FBC), is launching a new product called 'Under the Sea Minis,' which are fish-shaped iced shortcake biscuits. The NPD will launch exclusively into Asda on 24 April for 12 weeks. Additionally, FBC has unveiled a limited-edition Strawberry spin-off for Party Rings and a redesign of its packaging, rolling out in May.

articles.title: Olam Agri introduces Crown Thick Spaghetti: A delicious new twist on a classic favorite
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Crown Flour Mill, a subsidiary of Olam Agri in Nigeria, launched Crown Thick Spaghetti in Abuja on April 16, 2025. The new spaghetti is designed to meet consumer demand for thick-strand pasta and received positive feedback from distributors and consumers due to its versatility and non-sticky texture.

articles.title: motorola edge 60 stylus goes on sale April 23rd onwards with segment's first built in stylus with AI sketch to Image & other features at Rs. 21,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus, a smartphone with a built-in stylus, on April 23rd. The phone features AI tools, a 50MP camera, and a 6.7" display, and it's available on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and retail stores, priced at INR 21,999 with launch offers.

articles.title: 15 jobs created as high street bakery chain Greggs opens new store in Foyleside Shopping Centre in Derry
articles.author: Kevin Mullan
articles.summary: Greggs has opened a new outlet at Foyleside Shopping Centre in Derry, Northern Ireland, creating 15 new jobs. The shop features a modern design, indoor and outdoor seating, and an expanded menu including Greggs favorites, vegan alternatives, and limited-availability over ice drinks like Cloudy Lemonade and Iced Mocha. It also offers hot food options and special deals.

articles.title: Ninja multi-cooker that 'saves time in the kitchen' gets slashed to under £100 in sale
articles.author: Meghan Coon
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a discount on its Foodi Mini 6-in-1 Multi-Cooker, reducing the price to under £100. The multi-cooker features six customizable cooking functions including Pressure Cook, Air Fry, Slow Cook, Steam, Bake/Roast and Sear/Sauté, and utilizes TenderCrisp Technology for faster cooking and crispy results. The sale is available on Ninja's website, Amazon, and Argos.

articles.title: Coupang to sell Kiehl's skincare products on R.LUX with launch promotion
articles.summary: Global skincare brand Kiehl's products are now available on Coupang's R.LUX app, an online platform service run by Coupang. A promotion for Kiehl's products, including the Ultra Facial Cream, Calendula Herbal-Extract Toner, and Clearly Corrective Dark Spot Solution Essence, will run through Sunday, offering complimentary daily care kits. Coupang's Rocket Delivery will handle deliveries with exclusive packaging, and WOW members can receive cash rewards for Kiehl's purchases.

articles.title: When life gets too large for one screen: Here's why the foldable smartphones are for multitaskers
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: HUAWEI launched the Mate X6, a foldable smartphone designed for practicality and user experience. The Mate X6 features Live Multi-task that allows users to run up to three apps simultaneously. The phone's split-screen function improves photos and facilitates content creation.

articles.title: Natural Glow, Enhanced Skin: The Magic of Skin Tint
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Lovechild Masaba launched Skip Everything Blurring 4-in-1 Serum Skin Tint that combines primer, moisturizer, sunscreen, and foundation. Maybelline New York introduced Fit Me Fresh Tint with SPF 50 PA+++ and Vitamin C. Thou launched Hue Drops Sheer Skin Tint/Foundation with buildable coverage. House of Makeup launched Face Skin Tint Foundation which functions as a BB cream, CC cream, tinted moisturizer, and sunscreen.

articles.title: Upcoming Char Aznable Action Figure Came Here To Laugh At You
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Bandai Spirits announced a new Char Aznable action figure from 'Mobile Suit Gundam'. This constitutes the introduction of a new product by the company.

articles.title: Light Up Your Look: Choosing and Using the Perfect Highlighter
articles.summary: Typsy Beauty introduced Silk Cushion Liquid Highlighter, offering a luminous glow with hydrating benefits. Wet n Wild launched Megaglo Precious Petals highlighting powder for a natural glow. House of Makeup released a Liquid Highlighter, providing a smudge-proof, pearlescent glow. FAE Beauty debuted Double Dew Highlighter for a silky, radiant effect. Nykaa introduced Strobe & Glow Liquid Highlighter, offering a glazed bronze, metallic finish.

articles.title: Get a Sun-Kissed Glow: The Ultimate Guide to Bronzers
articles.summary: LoveChild Mini Masaba introduced a Bronzer Stick for contouring with a matte finish. Revolution launched Mega Bronzer, offering a warm, long-lasting, cruelty-free matte finish. Just Herbs released a Bronzer Stick providing a matte finish with Shea Butter. C2P Pro presents Cream Contour Palette with blendable, matte bronzer and Shea and Cocoa Butter. Makeup Revolution offers Superdewy Liquid Bronzer with a dewy, creamy, shimmer formula.

articles.title: Unlock Your Flawless Finish: The Power of Loose Setting Powder
articles.summary: Various setting powders are being promoted for makeup, controlling shine, and enhancing skin. These include ultra-fine matte powders and brightening luminous powders with full coverage, all designed to set makeup and offer various benefits like oil control, pore blurring, and natural radiance.

articles.title: 36 Products That Solve Problems So Fast And Painlessly You'll Be Like, 'Seriously, Where Have You Been This Whole Time??'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" sponge set. Hanalei is offering lip treatment products featuring Hawaiian kukui nut oil. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. SweatBlock introduced unscented wipes and I Dew Care introduced a benzene-free, travel-friendly applicator of dry shampoo powder.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, April 22, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com has launched a new version of its website, inviting users to test drive the updated platform.

articles.title: M&S 'classy but trendy' cardigan perfect for warmer weather that's under £30
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer offers the £29.50 Cotton Rich Open Stitch Cropped Cardigan, available in multiple colors and sizes. Tu features the £18 Pointelle Stripe Cardigan in black and neutral, and Next offers the £38 100% Cotton Stitch Knitted Cardigan in various colors and sizes. These cardigans are presented as new options for the spring season.

articles.title: Google Unlocks Gemini Live: No Subscription Needed to Use Screen Sharing, Video AI on Android
articles.author: Jose Enrico
articles.summary: Google has released Gemini Live's real-time video and screen-sharing support to all Android users. Previously limited to Gemini Advanced subscribers, this feature now allows broader access to a richer, more interactive AI experience on mobile. The update allows users to showcase their smartphone's camera view or navigate through apps in real-time.

articles.title: The rise of intelligent agents in scaling hyper-personalized marketing
articles.summary: Agentic AI and intelligent agents represent a new evolution of artificial intelligence designed to reshape hyper-personalized marketing. These AI-native systems autonomously execute tasks, make decisions, and engage users in human-like conversations at scale, maintaining context and adapting to customer behavior across digital touchpoints. This technology is introduced to streamline operations, enhance customer satisfaction, and drive business growth.

articles.title: Smallest things make the biggest difference when it comes to improving product experience
articles.author: Ruchira Jain
articles.summary: A leading travel company improved their website and app's user experience by strategically changing the display of search results. Quick commerce apps and food apps like Swiggy now offer curated options and features like ordering food via mood, while music apps like Spotify provide playlists for key occasions. Meesho designs its user interface specifically for India 2.2, offering vernacular language support and personalized recommendations.

articles.title: Amazon offering £100 off 'brilliant' vacuum cleaner dubbed 'better than Dyson'
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are drawn to the Henry Quick Cordless Stick Vacuum due to a £100 price reduction. Amazon Prime members can avail an additional £10 discount. The vacuum features a cordless design with up to 60 minutes of cleaning time, a pod system for emptying, and specialized tools.

articles.title: Motoring: Exclusive limited-time offer on Nissan Sunny
articles.summary: Y K Almoayyed & Sons (YKA), the exclusive distributor of Nissan vehicles in Bahrain, launched a limited-time promotion on the Nissan Sunny. The offer is valid for a limited period and subject to availability, starting from BD5,695. The Nissan Sunny offers contemporary design, comfort, advanced features, Intelligent Forward Emergency Braking, Around View Monitor and Blind Spot Warning systems.

articles.title: I thought Google had the best AI translation app, but I was wrong
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Oppo launched the Find X8 Ultra, a phone with a notable translation app. The translation app allows users to translate photos or screenshots directly on the device, addressing the challenge of communicating in languages like Mandarin, which are difficult for some to read and understand.

articles.title: Innophos expands Levair portfolio
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company has developed a new egg replacement product. This product is specifically designed for use by commercial bakeries. The introduction of this product signifies a new offering in the food industry.

articles.title: Get summer ready: Up to 40% off on Minimalist, Dot & Key and more face ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Amazon is launching the Next Gen Sale 2025, showcasing the latest face serums designed to hydrate, brighten, and smooth skin. These serums aim to provide various benefits, including a dewy finish and even-toned skin.

articles.title: SIXUNITED Unveils Deepseek Suite and 20+ New AI Products at 2025 Hong Kong AI PC ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SIXUNITED, a global consumer electronics leader, hosted an AI PC Launch Event in Hong Kong on April 19. They debuted over 20 AI products, including the Deepseek Suite, UMA high-performance laptops, all-in-ones, and tablets.

articles.title: 'I have Cristiano Ronaldo & LeBron James as examples' - Netflix drop new trailer for Vinicius Junior documentary as 'Baila, Vini' premiere date confirmed
articles.author: Goal
articles.summary: Netflix released a new trailer for Vinicius.

articles.title: Why Your AI Marketing Strategy Needs A Human Touch After All
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: OneSpot.ai is relaunching its go-to-market platform. This platform aims to help customers leverage human expertise alongside technology innovation for sales and marketing activities.

articles.title: We tried Five Guys latest addition and it's a taste of nostalgia
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A burger chain launched a new kids' menu for the first time.

articles.title: Heffron: TikTok Shop takes a toll on our wallet and our environment
articles.author: Daily Emerald
articles.summary: TikTok launched TikTok Shop in the United States in 2023. The platform is used for promoting and selling products.

articles.title: CHINA & THE WORLD
articles.summary: CRRC Dalian Co., Ltd. launched China's first 1,000-kilowatt battery-powered locomotives. The locomotives officially rolled off the production line on Monday in Dalian.

articles.title: Is There Value In A Curated Enterprise AI Experience?
articles.author: Jason Andersen
articles.summary: Google is differentiating its AI offerings with Agentspace, a new type of work interface personalized to the user.  To further drive user adoption and engagement, Google also announced the Agent Developer Kit, which is an open source set of methods to foster collaboration between agents and other remote services. In terms of solution deployment, Google offers tooling such as Vertex and Firebase for professional developers and Agentspace for the no-code development environment along with Model Garden.

articles.title: Google Faces Big ‘Android TV' Changes In India After Latest Antitrust Setback: What It Means ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Sony, Vu, and Hisense offer Android TVs in India. These TVs, available across the budget range, include the Play Store for apps.

articles.title: The Future of Online Marketing: Adobe introduces AI Agents
articles.author: Sify
articles.summary: Adobe has launched a new product designed to change how users interact with software tools like Photoshop, Acrobat, and Premiere Pro. This initiative intends to assist creatives in accelerating their workflow.
